name: Tanks! (BenjiBoy926)
description:
Controls:

Red: ASDW to move and SPACE to shoot

Blue: ARROW KEYS to move and RIGHT ENTER to shoot

***DISCLAIMER***

I DO NOT OWN THIS GAME.  This game was designed by engineers with Unity Technologies.  I built this game using a tutorial on Unity's website, using assets owned by Unity.

Tutorial: https://learn.unity.com/project/tanks-tutorial
